## Source: amazon-inspector (65fe1eb016adcd74c343cd1628168fca4112c383c79d2e8580aa81b80a3d162f)
The package commander-stable was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5ccb7d8128b93aac626500a0dc68514710622a75ffc9933611c0c3eff12d91e6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'commander-stable' @ 15.100.101 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
